title: The new ranked select is good but a joke too.
body: so i like being able to pick my roles before hand. but when u pick a ban then sometimes forget to lock in u get dodged and penalised. i know that i am not the only one maybe you should of taken the points loss away for first few days cause its getting on my nerves plus many others that i know.

replies.body: Its really not that hard to lock in your champion.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 
normally took me 20 mins to enter a game! it is a joke!
yeh thats what makes it worse i had been in que for almost 20 mins in and out of select because of other people doing the same thing then i do it.

so true ^^^^ how is not locking your champion penalty worth? I've always been one to just let the timer lock it in for me while i do my masteries and runes. been hit so many times with this and i don't even mean it. should be removed next patch because its so silly to have it
